echo-category-title-bs-admin-cat: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription on admin tasks
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-admin-cat: Tooltip for echo notification category bs-admin-cat
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-page-actions-cat: Tooltip for echo notification category bs-page-actions-cat
echo-pref-tooltip-bs-page-create-cat: Tooltip for echo notification category bs-page-creation-cat
echo-category-title-bs-page-actions-cat: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notification subscription on page actions
echo-category-title-bs-page-create-cat: Checkbox label for mail and wiki notifications for page creation
prefs-namespace-notifications: Label for user preferences section for notification selection matrix of namespaces
prefs-category-notifications: Label for user preferences section "echo/category-notificationsNotifications" for notifications subscription on categories
echo-category-title-bs-namespace-categor: Label for the notification category that notifies users on changes in namespaces and categories they are subscribed to
